name: Mists of Sherwood
text:
This is a transcript of our latest D&D session that occurred on 5/4/25, our 29th session in the Curse of Strahd campaign. We're near the end, and they're all level 9.

Please summarize the session, and be sure to include something that each Character did.

The Player Characters in this session are:

Tanis, Dan ReDruff, Jabroni, Mordecai, FTX and Sir Godfrey Gwilym

Here is the transcript: {transcript}
